newsitem.title: USA: Argosy set to launch floating casino.
newsitem.headline: Argosy set to launch floating casino.

text.p: Argosy Gaming Co on Friday will begin gaming aboard a new riverboat casino operating out of Lawrenceburg, Ind., the company said on Thursday.
The company said the Indiana Gaming Commission approved a license for the partnership it established to run the casino and an entertainment complex at Lawrenceburg, which is in the Cincinnati area.
The leased riverboat casino is equipped with 869 slot machines and 52 gaming tables, Argosy said.
Argosy operates riverboat casinos and related entertainment facilities in the U.S. Midwest and South.
Its stock was up 1/4 at 6-5/8 in Thursday afternoon trading on the New York Stock Exchange.
